data.Sentence_cn: 当那人试图让快艇转弯时，方向盘脱手了。
data.Sentence: As the man tried to swing the speedboat round, the steering wheel came away in his hands.

data.Sentence_cn: 他绝望地向他的伙伴挥手，他的伙伴在过去的15分钟里一直在滑水。
data.Sentence: He waved desperately to his companion, who had been water skiing for the last fifteen minutes.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们两个还没来得及意识到究竟发生了什么事情，就被猛地抛入了海里。
data.Sentence: Both men had hardly had time to realize what was happening when they were thrown violently into the sea.

data.Sentence_cn: 快艇撞上了一个浮标，但它仍在水面上快速行驶着。
data.Sentence: The speedboat had struck a buoy, but it continued to move very quickly across the water.

data.Sentence_cn: 两个人刚开始向岸边游去，就突然惊愕地发现快艇正在转着圈行驶，
data.Sentence: Both men had just begun to swim towards the shore, when they noticed with dismay that the speedboat was moving in a circle.

data.Sentence_cn: 它现在正以惊人的速度直冲他们驶来。
data.Sentence: It now came straight towards them at tremendous speed.

data.Sentence_cn: 不到1分钟的工夫，它从离他们只有几英尺远的地方呼啸着驶了过去。
data.Sentence: In less than a minute, it roared past them only a few feet away.

data.Sentence_cn: 快艇过去之后，他们以最快的速度向前游去，因为他们知道快艇马上就要转回来。
data.Sentence: After it had passed, they swam on as quickly as they could because they knew that the boat would soon return.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们刚刚来得及游出危险区，快艇就又转完了一圈。
data.Sentence: They had just had enough time to swim out of danger when the boat again completed a circle.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而这一次它的速度慢多了。
data.Sentence: On this occasion, however, it had slowed down considerably.
The petrol had nearly all been used up.

data.Sentence_cn: 没过多久，噪音便彻底消失，快艇开始在水面上慢悠悠地漂流。
data.Sentence: Before long, the noise dropped completely and the boat began to drift gently across the water.
